name: midnight waffle cardigan
notes: simple, oversized and pockets – what’s not to love! the midnight cardigan is the oversized fall sweater of your dreams! worked flat and built with half double crochets, this waffle-like textured cardigan features a wide boxy fit, slouchy sleeves and knit-look ribbing. pair the midnight waffle cardigan with jeans, over dresses or for lounging at home, this versatile crochet sweater is a modern take on the timeless waffle knit.
